ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition). Within ntms IDS: Description of neoclassical tearing modes.

ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field/r0.documentation: Reference major radius where the vacuum toroidal magnetic field is given (usually a fixed position such as the middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane). Within ntms IDS: Description of neoclassical tearing modes. Within vacuum_toroidal_field container: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition).

ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field/b0.documentation: Vacuum toroidal field at R0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewing from above. The product R0B0 must be consistent with the b_tor_vacuum_r field of the tf IDS. Within ntms IDS: Description of neoclassical tearing modes. Within vacuum_toroidal_field container: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition).

ntms/time_slice.documentation: Description of neoclassical tearing modes for various time slices. Within ntms IDS: Description of neoclassical tearing modes.

ntms/time_slice/mode.documentation: List of the various NTM modes appearing during the simulation. If a mode appears several times, use several indices in this array of structure with the same m,n values. Within ntms IDS: Description of neoclassical tearing modes. Within time_slice container: Description of neoclassical tearing modes for various time slices.

ntms/time_slice/mode/onset.documentation: NTM onset characteristics. Within ntms IDS: Description of neoclassical tearing modes. Within time_slice container: Description of neoclassical tearing modes for various time slices. Within mode container: List of the various NTM modes appearing during the simulation. If a mode appears several times, use several indices in this array of structure with the same m,n values.

Within ntms IDS: Description of neoclassical tearing modes. Within time_slice container: Description of neoclassical tearing modes for various time slices. Within mode container: List of the various NTM modes appearing during the simulation. If a mode appears several times, use several indices in this array of structure with the same m,n values.
